home.welcomeText: In this section, you can start a new adventure or resume your progress from a specific saga.

1.title: East Blue Saga
1.description: The saga that starts it all, where we meet Luffy and his dream of becoming Pirate King.

2.title: Alabasta Saga
2.description: The crew arrives in the desert of Alabasta to fight Crocodile and save the kingdom.

3.title: Sky Island Saga
3.description: An adventure in the sky, where pirates look for legendary treasures and face Enel.

4.title: Water 7 Saga
4.description: The crew reaches Water Seven, where decisive events happen for their future.

5.title: Thriller Bark Saga
5.description: A mysterious island where the crew fights zombies and the powerful Gecko Moria.

6.title: Summit War Saga
6.description: The biggest war in the One Piece world, deciding the fate of Ace and Luffy.

7.title: Fish-Man Island Saga
7.description: After a two-year time skip, the crew returns to continue their journey in the New World.

8.title: Dressrosa Saga
8.description: A long and dangerous saga where the crew faces Doflamingo in the New World.

9.title: Whole Cake Island Saga
9.description: The crew tries to rescue Sanji from Big Mom's family, one of the Four Emperors.

10.title: Wano Country Saga
10.description: The Samurai saga and alliance to defeat Kaido â€“ the world's balance is at stake.
